trends: There have been 7 other sightings in New Caney
There were no other sightings in New Caney on or around September 27th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWENT OUTSIDE AT 8:03 PM TO TAKE A BREAK FROM A POKER GAME AND SAW AN EXTREMLY LARGE LIGHTED OBJECT HOVERING AT ABOUT 2,000 FT. THE OBJECT APPEARED IN THE NW DIRECTION AT THAT TIME IT NEVER MOVED JUST A BIG BRIGHT LIGHT. ABOUT 2 MINS LATER A COMERCIAL PLANE FLEW UNDER IT. SO U COULD SEE THAT THE OBJECT WAS HUGE. NO PULSESATING LIGHTS JUST BRIGHT. MY FRIEND SAW IT ASWELL. I TRIED TO TAKE A PICTURE OF THE OBJECT WITH MY CELL PHONE AND MY PHONE STARTED TO BLINK THAN SHUT OFF. IM A PROFESSINAL PHOTOGRAPHER I SPECIALIZE IN LANDSCAPE PHOTOGRAPHY. I ALSO NAVIGATED MY SAILBOAT OF THE COAST OF MEXICO FOR A YEAR TRAVELING. I KNOW THE POSITION OF THE STARS AND IT WAS NOT A STAR. IT WAS BELOW THE HORIZON AND WAS TO BIG AND TO CLOSE TO MY POSITION TO BE A STAR.ABOUT 13 MINS LATER I WENT OUTSIDE TO SEE IT AGAIN A THE OBJECT WAS GONE.BUT THE SAME STARS THAT WERE THERE AT THE TIME OF THE SIGHTING WERE STILL THERE.
Summary: HUGE BRIGHT LITE ABOUT A QUATER THE SIZE OF FULL MOON 15 MINS LATER IT WAS GONE
